Okay Peeps, here is the Yaar Yarr Fix :D

Credits to Iamawesome in BG.

HOW TO


Step 1: Access Windows Firewall settings

http://www.imagehost.co.za/image-6F3E_4FC264F8.jpg

Step 2: Choose "Allow a program or Feature through Windows Firewall"

http://www.imagehost.co.za/image-5A1F_4FC264F8.jpg

Step 3: Here I chose "Allow another program" because Dirt Showdown's exe file was not part of my list

http://www.imagehost.co.za/image-CAA7_4FC264F8.jpg

Step 4: Make sure that the box to the left of "Dirt Showdown" is unticked

http://www.imagehost.co.za/image-870A_4FC264F8.jpg

Step 5: Go to "Advanced Settings"

http://www.imagehost.co.za/image-F1D9_4FC264F8.jpg

Step 6: Now "Windows Firewall with Advanced Security" will open up, select "Inbound Rules"

http://www.imagehost.co.za/image-67A1_4FC2664E.jpg

Step 7: You should see four (4) entries for "Dirt showdown" as being greyed out in the list 
PS: If you don't have 4 entries, don't worry, just do the steps below for each of the entries you have.

http://www.imagehost.co.za/image-7B8E_4FC2664E.jpg

Step 8: Right-click the first one and choose "Properties" from the popup menu

http://www.imagehost.co.za/image-5542_4FC2664E.jpg

Step 9: Next, the "Dirt Showdown" properties window will open, here you need to select "Block the connection" radio button, then click on "Apply" and "Ok"



Step 10: To make the rule active, you need to right-click the first entry again and choose "Enable" from the popup menu



Step 11: Repeat step 8 - 10 for the other 3 entries

Step 12: Delete the "showdown_avx.exe" file if it's still in your directory (VERY IMPORTANT)

Step 13: Once finished, launch the game again, it might still show the info next to your Profile Name as "Yarr yarr" but everything else in game should be normal now. You should also be able to select an appropriate audio name too.

Upon exiting and relaunching for a second time, it also removed the last "Yarr yar" text next to my profile name.

And that's it, enjoy a "Yarr yaarrr" free game  :8=)
